alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN NASSAU AND CENTRAL DUVAL COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 349 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ratliff to near Normandy. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Jacksonville International Arpt, Arlington, Baymeadows, Cisco Gardens, Ortega, Nas Jax, Nassau Village-Ratliff, Ratliff, and Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
